artist: Artist: Itō Shinsui; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: portrait (bijin-ga); seated woman wearing blue and white kimono and multicolored obi, holding a blue and white fan, watching an exploding firework in the sky
inscription: 昭和七年初夏 {Shōwa shichinen shoka} (Early Summer 1932)
markings: red artist\'s seal: 深水 {Shinsui} |  LRC, publisher seal: ワタナベ {Watanabe} | LL, publisher seal: 版権所有　渡邊庄三郎 {hanken shoyū Watanabe Shōzaburō} (copyright Watanabe Shōzaburō) | On back, red seal: 貮百五拾枚絶版　第貮百参拾四番 {nihyakugojū mai zeppan, dai nihyakusanjūyon ban} (edition of 250, number 234) | red square publisher seal: わたなべ {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Second Collection of Modern Beauties (Gendai bijin shū dai nishū 現代美人集第二輯)
title: Fireworks
